title: Simulation-Based Self-Directed Science Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Weekend/evening sessions for working learners, providing mobile-optimized content

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members to design simulation scenarios for scientific problem-solving.
Learners can analyze and discuss experimental results using smartphone-based simulation tools.
Learners can present learning outcomes based on scientific evidence and incorporate feedback during debriefing sessions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
